title: webdav error after transfering owncloud 5.0 from virtualbox to xen-host
body:
after transfering the database and copying the owncloud-folder (v.5.0), i see this error in webinterface admin:

>**einrichtungswarnung**
>dein web-server ist noch nicht fã¼r datei-synchronisation bereit, weil die webdav-schnittstelle vermutlich defekt ist.	 bitte prã¼fe die instalationsanleitungen.

befor the transfer it works normally.

i have a new self-signed ssl-certificate on the new server and activated force ssl in owncloud.

i updated it on the new server from 5.0 to 5.0.5 and have still this error.

testet with https and without.

safe_mode is off

maybe related to https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/2495?

---

owncloud 5.0.5
ubuntu 12.04.2 lts
apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu)
php 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6
mysql  ver 14.14 distrib 5.5.31

---

owncloud.log
```
{"app":"core","message":"adding user backend instance of oc_user_database.","level":0,"time":1366973275}
```
